entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Hello, cruel world.

My name is Andrey and this is by first post. That is my first experience in blogging and writing texts in English. Before writing first post I tried to find some answers for common questions of beginner bloggers.

What’s this blog about?

Well, That is my space to write about some issues that interested me. Also I would like to use blog to share my observations and results.

What I would like to receive from blog?

It’s very easy. I want to increase skills in English and text writing. I guess that appearance (text, speech or presentation) helps to clearly enunciate and understand idea I would like to perform. Also, it helps to receive best feedback and suggestion.

If you find that my blog is interested for you it will be great too.

So, welcome to my blog.
